description: The Samastipur RTO (BR-33) serves the Samastipur district in Bihar, operating under the Darbhanga administrative division. It manages vehicle registration, driving licenses, and transport law enforcement for this major agricultural hub and critical railway junction. The office is centrally located at the Collectorate Building in Kasipur to facilitate regional transport services.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Uttarayan, Kasipur, Samastipur, Bihar
